original_title: The Autumn of the Ceibo Tree
overview: The Ceibo tree, which had played an essential role in Mayan culture, is the protagonist of Alejandro Mouj√°n's short film from 2016, in which the director observes the passing of time, this transitory state that is so precious, and yet goes almost unnoticed. The Ceibo tree, a beautiful natural creation, becomes a symbol, a mirror of ourselves.
title: The Autumn of the Ceibo Tree
